value:
Prince Alfonse is so sensible and so
kind... He reminds me of—no, I
apologize. I won't bore you.

The empire was built on the backs of
the oppressed. I knew this. And yet
all I did was fight the liberation army...

Your clothes are rumpled! If you find
yourself in a position of leadership, be
sure you look the part.

I can see how tense you are. If you
don't take a break, you'll crumple right
when everyone needs you most.$k$pNow's a good time to stop and take a
rest.
Lord Julius... Forgive me... I...

I am Ishtar. I anticipate the warm
continuation of your friendship with
$Nf.

Witness my talent! I am Ishtar,
Goddess of Thunder!
Little by little, I grow stronger.

Pardon my incompetence. I have
no excuses.

I am grateful. I'll work even
harder, so anticipate results.

I am Ishtar of Friege. Please make
use of my knowledge of sorcery.

Tell me, $Nu...
Do you have feelings for anyone?$k$pWhether or not they return your love,
or if it is unrequited...$k$pI know this question is sudden. I ask
because I must understand
something...$k$pNot long ago, I fought for one I loved
deeply.$k$pI fought even though I knew this path
was wrong, both as a warrior and as a
woman.$k$pThere may be a time when you must
choose your path, as I did...$k$pPromise me one thing. When that time
comes, do not make a choice that you
will live to regret.
はぁっ！
せいっ！
きゃああっ！
Wh..what...!
I am sorry.
There's nothing more to be said.
You will die here.
Mjölnir's wrath!
Lord Julius... I...
Hehe
I am Ishtar, known as the goddess of thunder.
Ah! What do you want?
Sacrifice children to that dark god? I cannot do it.
Lord Julius... Please forgive me.
Reinhardt served me ever since I was a child...
Perhaps... Perhaps I was in the wrong.
When I'm with you, I feel my doubts melt away.
Yes.
Your orders?
Send me.
